adHeader: ▪▪►CALL US FOR ALL POOL TABLE MOVES!
adDetails: Assembling a pool table or taking it apart can be difficult for the consumer and without the proper tools can be darn right frustrating! It isn't any easier to move a table, handling and lifting the slate can be hard on the back and can be a struggle to move, especially up or down a flight of stairs. The slate can weigh six to nine hundred pounds and must be handled carefully. Not breaking or cracking the slate is important to ensure the integrity of the pool table performance and game play! THESE ARE A FEW REASONS WHY BILLIARD MANUFACTURERS RECOMMEND USING A QUALIFIED BILLIARD PROFESSIONAL!
